size.desc: Size in CSS units, including unit name

font-size.desc: The size in CSS units, including unit name, of the content (icon, text)

color.desc: Color name for component from the Quasar Color Palette

text-color.desc: Overrides text color (if needed); color name from the Quasar Color Palette

icon.desc: Icon name following Quasar convention; make sure you have the icon library installed

square.desc: Removes border-radius so borders are squared

rounded.desc: Applies a small standard border-radius for a squared shape of the component

default.desc: Optional; Suggestions: one character string, tag
